description: This file contains integration tests for the 'lmstudio' model using the 'Agent' class and various tools such as YFinanceTools, DuckDuckGoTools, and ExaTools. It verifies tool invocation, streaming responses, asynchronous behavior, and multiple tool calls within the context of the 'lmstudio' model.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool invocation with the 'Agent' using the 'YFinanceTools' to fetch current stock price.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response and detection of tool calls during streaming.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool invocation with 'YFinanceTools'.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool invocation.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple simultaneous tool calls for different stocks.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple different tools ('YFinanceTools' and 'DuckDuckGoTools') invoked in a single run.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests invoking a custom tool function with no parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests invoking a custom tool function with optional parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests invoking a tool with multiple URLs as input.
